last_episode_to_air.name: Nejma
last_episode_to_air.overview: A furious Ismael heads out on a risky mission to Tangiers, his Moroccan hometown, putting family ties and the business at stake.

name: Soil
overview: In a community bound by an age-old tradition, how possible is it to revamp a business for the dead? A Moroccan-Belgian entrepreneur attempts to find out.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: In Brussels, first-generation Moroccan immigrant and funerary business owner Omar retires, leaving his right-hand daughter and rebellious son in charge.

episodes.name: Barking Dogs
episodes.overview: Convinced that his idea is the future of the business, Ismael sets out to do some marketing with JB. Meanwhile, Omar keeps a big secret from his family.

episodes.name: Death of a Promise
episodes.overview: Ismael's one-off burial suddenly becomes the firm's specialty, so along with Nadia they prepare for the next one — a challenging, high-profile service.

episodes.name: He Who Digs a Well
episodes.overview: To buy Vanessa's silence and save the project, Ismael and JB get crafty and think out of the box. A miserable Rachid faces criticism from the community.

episodes.name: Palace Street
episodes.overview: Business booms and the firm gets nominated for an award, so Ismael sets out to secure funds for an expansion amid clashes with Rachid over customers.

episodes.name: Concession F24
episodes.overview: A tragic event ends Omar's trip and his return sets off a series of revelations and clashes complicating Ismael's situation. Brahim's truth gets out.

episodes.name: Diwan Awards
episodes.overview: Ahead of the Diwan Awards, Nadia scrambles to save the business and seeks Ismael's help. The arrival of an unannounced guest stirs up some family drama.

episodes.name: Nejma
episodes.overview: A furious Ismael heads out on a risky mission to Tangiers, his Moroccan hometown, putting family ties and the business at stake.
